name: Monster Pop!
description:
Hey Sheriff !!! Help the village to get rid of those crazy Monsters!

Really simple control. Drag & Shoot the Monster and don’t let them cross the line!

Key features:
-A Huge variety of Monsters and great Bosses
-Play in different environments
-Full of Nice & Smooth Effects.
-Lots of PowerUp features
-Upgrade your Gun to defeat the Monsters much easier.
-Defeat the Bosses and catch their treasures !!

Enjoy !!
